message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down a bit to $110, but I can't go as low as $90. I believe this product will really benefit you.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $110, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
